content.new: Parsing a URDF like the one below, (with 2 links connected by a fixed joint, lumping disabled), produces a model with 2 links joined by a revolute joint.  This behavior seems surprising to me, but is clearly implemented intentionally (https://bitbucket.o
content.old: Parsing a URDF like the one below, (with 2 links connected by a fixed joint, lumping disabled), produces a model with 2 links joined by a revolute joint.  This behavior seems surprising to me, but is clearly implemented intentionally (https://bitbucket.o

issue.title: Disabling lumping on a fixed joint in a URDF results in a revolute joint
